title: Villager?s Town
briefDescription: From a simple village into a detailed town, Villagers Town has everything you need for survival and it is not just a village, it is ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
From a simple village into a detailed town, Villagers Town has everything you need for survival and it is not just a village, it is a town. Just explore and see the beauty of the town.
What?s inside of the Villagers Town?
Villagers Town has everything you need for survival. There has fishing area, farming area, crafting area, smelting area, repairing area and so much more. In this town, you can see the hospital, church, bank, bakery, school, camping area and more. You can live in the hobbit holes and some houses that you have started to survive.
How many months did you build this town?
I took 3 months to build this town. So, explore it and see all of my hardworks.
What can I do in this world?
You have so many to do in that world. You can start your own survival and take so many adventures, even you can play hide and seek by just putting something. And then, play PvP with your friends. So, there has lot of stuffs to do in this world. So, thanks for downloading and have enjoyed.

title: Date With Your Partner
briefDescription: Ever wanted to go on a cute minecraft date? This map is for you!Join the world and fly on the top of a moutain ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Join the world and fly on the top of a moutain where you find a cute seating with a custom tree. Make your date come and it may begin.
When you join the world, you spawn next to a huge flower forest/plains mountain where on the top of it you find a cute little place for you to chill with your significant other.
Play some romantic music and when the night comes?FIREWORKS!
This map includes a redstone system for shooting fireworks without stopping.
After a long night, there?s a small house waiting for you in the distance where you can chill together and get some rest.

title: Libbywolf1617?s Mansion
briefDescription: This is a map made for my friend. It is a mansion with a lot of space. We have a complete interior but feel free ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a map made for my friend. It is a mansion with a lot of space. We have a complete interior but feel free to decorate it and change anything i hope you enjoy. This map has space for a lot of activity and would be perfect for role play with your friends.
The mansion comes fully furnished with four floors as well as a basement with a bar,game room,art room,toilets and a laundry room for parties and hangout or if u just want to do some fun art. The first floor has a kitchen, dinning room, living room, office and a chill zone as well as a indoor pool with changing rooms for some relaxing chill out fun with friends. where as the second floor has four bedroom a master bedroom with an office and two bathrooms it also has balcony?s and a library. On the third floor there is four bedrooms two storage rooms and one bathroom as well as a balcony. In the attic there is one bedroom and a party room.
Outside the mansion consist of a pool with a Jacuzzi and bar for outdoor parties, as well as a tennis court a basket ball court for the athletic type and a aquarium with beautiful animals. Woodland, farm and a camping area as well as ponds with a waterfall you can stand on top of for a beautiful view.
So download this map today and maybe use it for a role-play lol

title: Escape From The Mind [Horror]
briefDescription: Escape From The Mind is a new level of horror. In this map, Herobrine has captured you and entered your mind to terrorize you. Your ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Escape From The Mind is a new level of horror. In this map, Herobrine has captured you and entered your mind to terrorize you. Your goal in this map is to escape from your mind by finding secrets as well as the hidden lore. Will you find a way to escape and beat Herobrine?

WARNING: This map has lots of jumpscares and flashing images!
Explore the map and find a way to escape
Look in chests for items you can use to help you
Find stone brick walls with a gold speck to find hidden secrets and useful items
And remember, he is always watching

crawledImageUrls.text: Hello! Ever wanted to see the mobs of The Nether but just cant because your scared to go near them? Well youre in luck, because theres a new zoo in town called The Nether Zoo!!!
All for the sake of your entertainment, we took them from The Nether and brought them here!
Here they get food, shelter, and watched.

title: Modern Mansion for Gamers!
briefDescription: Hi fellow gamers! Thanks for clicking on this map, made by me, DJMonkey101! Hope you all enjoy the serene pool and hot tub, 2 guest homes, ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hi fellow gamers! Thanks for clicking on this map, made by me, DJMonkey101! Hope you all enjoy the serene pool and hot tub, 2 guest homes, massive treehouse, and much more!
I took about 2 months on this estate, so I hope you all enjoy it! Massive patios, Dolphin and Fish Aquarium, with a beehive on the second story. Strider farm brought to you from the nether, we have a nether portal surrounded in crying obsidian. On this world, if you go the right way, then there is also some pixel art I took some time to complete, so comment down below if you find it ?

title: Altar/Statue of Modeus (From Helltaker)
briefDescription: This world is a creation of Modeus from Helltaker. Here you can do 3 different things. Explore, Give her a flower, Find secrets and Easter eggs ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This world is a creation of Modeus from Helltaker. Here you can do 3 different things. Explore, Give her a flower, Find secrets and Easter eggs I put in so there is additional content :).
Hello and Welcome :D. So.. I built Modeus(From Helltaker) and I?m usually a bad builder or pixel art Maker but I?m pretty proud with this one. There is not much to do here, but you can give her a flower, Take a better look of her, And very much explore the map to find some secrets and Easter eggs I put in. You may find someone, or something that reveals a? not so much of a secret of me ;). I?ll add more and design the place a little bit in the future but this is all I can do for now.

title: Custom Universal Park MCPE (Creation) v2
briefDescription: Welcome to my custom version of universal with islands of adventure and universal studios combined into one park. There are plenty of fun attractions and ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Welcome to my custom version of universal with islands of adventure and universal studios combined into one park. There are plenty of fun attractions and rides! Have as much fun as you can and there will be more in the park as the world updates!
created by SkeleReaper789
Textures used: Realistic World Shadow Shader by C-G Gamer Play, Attraction minecart by Vernian LEMO
Behaviors used: Attraction Minecart By Vernian LEMO, More Useful Armor Stand By Vernian LEMO,
Here are a few shots of the theme park. Every ride is fully self-automatic and functional. There are great things with command blocks and I recommend you ride the amazing adventures of Spider-Man! With the new update, the FearFall tower was fixed and there are plans to make the Ghostbusters and Walking Dead attractions in the near future. Enjoy this Spider-Man Ride Update, it took me 4 days straight to build it and I hope you enjoy! (It?s GREAT).

title: Breath of the Wild: Link?s House
briefDescription: A recreation of Link's house from Zelda, Breath of the Wild in Minecraft. The house includes an interior that's decorated and even a secret room! ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A recreation of Link?s house from Zelda, Breath of the Wild in Minecraft. The house includes an interior that?s decorated and even a secret room! Would be good for a survival starter house!!
I wanted to build the house for a friend but I decided to share it too. It?s fully furnished with a kitchen, bedroom area, and even a fireplace.
The house isn?t exactly Link?s house, it?s just a recreation with my own little twists!

title: Prismarina Aquarium
briefDescription: Have you ever wanted to see an epic aquarium in Minecraft? Hello, my name is claire1593 and I, too, wanted to explore an awesome aquarium ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Have you ever wanted to see an epic aquarium in Minecraft? Hello, my name is claire1593 and I, too, wanted to explore an awesome aquarium without having to pay or switch consoles. So I started building one in October of 2018 and have been working on it ever since. I do hope you guys enjoy it. Since this aquarium is constantly being added to, you can check out my Instagram @clairel593 for more updates.

Welcome to Prismarina Aquarium! Here, multiple attractions include a Deep Sea Adventure Exhibit, a Guardian Amphitheater, over 200 Tropical Fish tanks, Hydrothermal vents tanks, and Bioluminescent tanks. And there?s much much more. With more attractions coming soon. For quick and easy access to the 2nd floor, feel free to use the bubblevators. For those who want a bite to eat while at the Aquarium, please visit our complimentary Aquatic Bar & Grill. And, what?s an epic aquarium without an epic gift shop located directly below the Sea Turtle exhibit. Come visit us at night for an epic Deep Sea Adventure.

title: Simple Village
briefDescription: This is a village in a flat world where life is just simple because there has only two kinds of villager's houses and 16 workplaces. There ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a village in a flat world where life is just simple because there has only two kinds of villager?s houses and 16 workplaces. There has some trees that cover up the village.
Welcome to the Simple Village, where life is simple and the village is so simple. Where you can take your simplicity adventure in the village
The Simple Village From the Top

Whats inside in this village?
In the village, there has 16 houses and 16 workplaces, so it means 1 house per workplaces.
I used two kinds of villager?s houses that it is commonly seen in the villages and I used it because it is very simple that perfect for my Simple Village.
Snapshot of the houses

Workplaces of the Village.
There has 16 workplaces that very useful for survival and these workplace are just made for villager?s professions.
Snapshots of the Workplaces
